column2: I'd have to say that anything I found not to my taste was probably pretty much a matter of personal preference.  For example
column3: I don't like fatty beef and the brisket was kind of fatty.  Good flavor
column5: the pork was lean and delicious.  The ribs were very good
column6: though neither were the fall-off-the-bone sort which I prefer.  The dry rubs were excellent
column7: but the sauce had a lot of cumin in it and I just barely tolerate cumin.
